_description: Horn Childe and Maiden Rimhild — 1136 lines in 12-line stanzas (aabaabccbddb)

NLS1921.First Lines:
Mi leue frende dereHerken & ȝe may
                    here…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…When þorbrond herd þisÞat horn to lon y comen
                    is…
NLS1921.Note: 1136 lines in this MS; slightly imperfect.
